1106 Sub-Lessee having paid the Consideration of Rs.13347177/-( Rupees One Crore

receipt whereof the JAL hereby acknowledge and admit, towards full and final
consideration, the Sub-Lessor hereby transfers and conveys to the Sub-Lessee the

Location and Floor Plan attached as Annexure-I1 , together with the rights, easements
and appurtenances on the Sub-Lessee agreeing to observe and perform the terms and
conditions mentioned hereinafter.
The Consideration, interalia, includes charges for Preferential Location, if any, charges
towards common use of Internal Development & Electric Substation etc. and 01 Car
Parking Slot (s), as communicated to the Sub-Lessee alongwith the Offer of Possession,

Parking Slot(s) is inseparable right with the Demised Premises and the Sub Lessee has no
right to transfer/sub-lease/sell and/or deal with the Parking Slot(s) independent of the
Demised Premises.

Slot(s) for use only has been given by the Sub-Lessor to the Sub-Lessee. This Sub-Lease

No.599/X-501 of Finarice Department, Government of U.P. dated
25.03.1942 and has also been held and decided by the Board of Revenue
in reference case No.173/84-1990-01 decided on 11.12.1990 and by
ADM. Finance Kanpur vide Case No. 10/1990-91 vide order dated
20.12.1990, and also by A.LG. Kanpur Nagar vide case no. 590/1999-2000
vide order dated 31.03.2000, hence no stamp duty is payable in this
Instrument since transferee is Subsidiary Company of the Transferor
Company as more than 90% of the issued capital of the Subsidiary/ . *
Transferee Company is in the beneficial ownership of the Holding/
Transferor Company. The parties to this instrument have obtained
certificate to this effect from the Registrar of Companies Uttar Pradesh &
Uttarakhand, Kanpur.

AND WHEREAS brief facts of the title of land are as under:
WHEREAS originally one Kailash Nath Bhargav out of funds of joint
hindu family purchased Bunglow No. 12/477, Mc Robert Ganj, Kanpur
along with Na: il leasehold land Plot No. 19, Block-12, Mc Robert Ganj,
Kanpur vide sale deed dated 20.12.1940 duly registered in the Office of A
Sub-Registrar, Kanpur as Bahl No.1, Volume 1157 at Pages 111 to 118 at
Serial N0.2853 on 21.12.1940 along with the right to get renew the lease
in his favour.
WHEREAS an oral family partition took place between members of
the Kailash Nath Bhargav HUF on 01.04.1974 and Kailash Nath Bhargav
- and his wife Smt. Shakuntala Bhargav became owner of 40% share of the
i Bungalow and his three sons namely Om Prakash Bhargav, Prem Prakash
Bhargav and Aditya Prakash Bhargav became owner of 60% share of the
bungalow and all started to file income tax returns as per their shares.
AND WHEREAS after the demised of Kailash Nath Bhargav and Smt.
Shakuntala Bhargav their only legal heirs three sons 1. Om Prakash
Bhargav, 2. Prem Prakash Bhargav 3. Aditya Prakast! Bhargav and five
daughters namely 4. Smt. Satya Bhargav, 5. Smt. Sarla Bhargav, 6. Smt.
Uma Bhargav, 7. Smt. Nirmala Bhargav and 8. Smt. Manju Bhargav all
became joint owners of 40% share of the above Bungalow No. 12/477, Mc
Robert Ganj, Kanpur. |
AND WHEREAS legal heirs of Kailash Nath Bhargav tried many times
to renew the lease deed and vacate the premises from the tenants but
५ they were not succeeded hence they entered in to an agreement dated
" 24.01.1987 with M/s Pragati Nirman Company (a partnership firm) having
4 its office at 85/6, Fazalganj, Kanpur through its partner Rajkumar Sharma,
Mahesh Jain & others to vacate the premises, renew lease deed and to
sanction map from the competent authority for construction. दे
AND WHEREAS M/s Pragati Nirman Company had vacated whole
Bungalow No. 12/477, Mc Robert Ganj, Kanpur from the tenants and
obtained possession with his own money and resources. Thereafter firm
demolished the entire construction over the premises and retained his
possession over the entire vacant premises.

किये जाने हेतु प्रस्तुत प्रार्थना पत्र के साथ संलग्न पंजीकृत बैनामा दिनांक - 18.03.2021 के
आधार पर उक्त भूखण्ड की TAR डीड दिनांक 05.12.1927 में निहित संभी शर्तों व प्रतिबन्धों
के अधीन तथा विकास प्राधिकरण के समस्त पावनों का प्रथम अधिकार सुरक्षित रखते हुए भूखण्ड
के जुज भाग क्षेत्रफल 9354.

2021 के
आधार पर उक्त भूखण्ड की TAR डीड दिनांक 05.12.1927 में निहित संभी शर्तों व प्रतिबन्धों
के अधीन तथा विकास प्राधिकरण के समस्त पावनों का प्रथम अधिकार सुरक्षित रखते हुए भूखण्ड
के जुज भाग क्षेत्रफल 9354.80 वर्गमी0 पर मूल केता श्री लाला कमला पत मैनेजर श्री द्वारिका
धीश टैम्पल ट्रस्ट पुत्र Wo लाला जुग्गी लाल अर्थात श्री द्वारिका धीश टैम्पल: ट्रस्ट A Pubilc
Religious and charitable trust office at Kamla Towar 29/1 द्वारिका धीश रोड कानपुर द्वारा
अथ्राईडज्ड ट्रस्टी अजय कुमार सरावगी पुत्र Wo श्री किशन लाल सरावगी अथंराईज्ड वाई बोर्ड
मीटिंग 25.12.2020 का नाम पृथक करते हुए प्रस्तुत Ho न्यायालय के निर्णय दिनांक 18.12.2020
के आधार पर वर्णित बैनामा दिनांक 18.08.2021 के अनुसार भूखण्ड सं0-11, 117 12 व 13
योजना सं0-3ए खलासी लाइन जुज भाग क्षेत्रफल 9354.

2020 का नाम पृथक करते हुए प्रस्तुत Ho न्यायालय के निर्णय दिनांक 18.12.2020

योजना सं0-3ए खलासी लाइन जुज भाग क्षेत्रफल 9354.80 वर्गमी0 का मूल केता के रूप में

कार्यालय 60/52 नयागंज कानपुर का नाम प्राधिकरण अभिलेखों में भूखण्ड सं0-11, 11ए 12 व
13 योजना सं0-3ए खलासी लाइन के भूमि का उपविभाजन किया गया है, इस लिये उपविभाजन
की अनुमति प्राप्त करने एंव FR डीड की सभी शर्ते आवेदक पर लागू रहने के साथ विकय
किये गये कुल जुज भाग में से 278.68 वर्गमी0 भूमि के क्षेत्रफल को छोड़कर शेष भाग क्षेत्रफल
9354.80 वर्ग Wo का नामांतरण किया जाना है। TRIER विकय विलेख में क्षेत्रफल को भी
संशोधित कराये जाने की शर्तों के अधीन उपाध्यक्ष महोदय द्वारा दिनांक 15.03.2022 को स्वीकृति
प्रदान करदी गयी है, यदि आप द्वारा कार्यालय में प्रस्तुत अभिलेखो में कोई भी त्रुटि पायी गयी तो
आप के पक्ष में किया गया ARR स्वतः निरस्त समझा जायेगा।

a 14. Admission of New Partner: The partners, if they unanimously agree, may take any
person as a new partner in accordance with the provisions of the LLP Act, Rules and this
agreement. On admission this agreement shall be binding on the new partner subject to
such modifications and conditions or New LLP Agreement as may be decided among the
partners.

15. Retirement of a Partner: A partner may retire from the LLP by giving a notice of not
less than 60 (sixty) days in writing at the registered office of the LLP. Unless otherwise
agreed, the retirement shall be effective on the expiry of the said period of 60 days or
such other carlicr date as the LLP may intimate. The remaining partners shall carry on the
business of the LLP on such terms and conditions as they may mutually decide.

Act, and is willing to join as partner, failing which the LLP shall continue with remaining

partners on such terms and conditions as they may decide.

Working Partners: All the Partners including Designated Partners shall be the working
partners and shall contribute their time and efforts for the efficient running of the business

and affairs of the LLP. The partners may allocate the various works and responsibilities

amongst themselves by mutual understanding from time Lo time.

have the right to nominate or change the working partners and designated partners of the

LLP,
13. The working partners shall not be paid any remuneration. However, the partners by
= majority decision may decide by executing a remuneration agreement signed by all the
partners to pay remuneration to all or any of the working partners which shall be a charge
on the profit of the LLP as and when the partners decide to do so.

14. Admission _of New Partner: The partners, if they unanimously agree, may take any
person as a new partner in accordance with the provisions of the LLP Act, Rules and this
agreement. On admission this agreement shall be binding on the new partner subject to
such modifications and conditions or New LLP Agreement as may be decided among the

uy partners.

less than 60 (sixty) days in writing at the registered office of the LLP. Unless otherwise

आवास एवं शहरी नियोजन अनुमाग-3 लखनऊ: ....दिनांक: 0 $- मार्च, 2015
विषय:- राज्य शहरी आवास एवं पर्यावास नीति-2014 के क्रम में नए विकास में मिश्रित
उपयोग तथा 'ट्रान्जिट RTRs डेवल्पमेन्ट' (टी.ओ.डी.)के लिए जोनिंग रेगुलेशन्स,
“प्लानिंग नॉर्म्स' एवं भवन उपविधि का निर्धारण किए जाने के सम्बन्ध में |
महोदय,
मुझे यह कहने का निदेश हुआ है कि राज्य शहरी आवास एवं पर्यावास नीति-2014 में
Fifa एवं सुस्थिर शहरों के विकास हेतु प्राविधानित रणनीति के अन्तर्गत नए विकास में
मिश्रित उपयोग की अनुमति तथा 'मास रैपिड ट्रान्जिट Rey (एम.आर.टी.एस ) कॉरीडोॉर्स के
साथ 'ट्रान्जिट ओरिएन्टड डेवल्पमेन्ट' (टी.ओ.डी.)को प्रोत्साहित किए जाने की व्यवस्था है।
इस सम्बन्ध में उक्त नीति के प्रस्तर-6.1.2 एवं प्रस्तर-6.1.3 में निहित प्राविधानों के क्रम में
